mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(login_id, password, name, role, status, phone_number, email, created_at, created_by) VALUES (#{loginId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{role}, #{status}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email}, #{createdAt}, #{createdBy})

INSERT INTO user_address(id, login_id, street_address, detail_address, latitude, longitude, created_at, modified_at, created_by, modified_by) VALUES (UNHEX(REPLACE(UUID(), '-', '')), #{loginId}, #{streetAddress}, #{detailAddress}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{createdAt}, #{modifiedAt}, #{createdBy}, #{modifiedBy})
mapper.select: SELECT hex(SUBSTR(id, 1, 16)) AS id, login_id, street_address, detail_address, latitude, longitude FROM user_address WHERE login_id = #{loginId}
SELECT id, login_id, password, name, role, status, phone_number, email FROM user WHERE id = #{id};
